sentences.sContent: People expect others to be honest, which is why conmen find it so easy to hoodwink people.
sentences.sCn: 人们期待他人是诚实的，所以骗子很容易行骗得逞。

remMethod.val: hood(帽兜) + wink(眨眼) → 眨眼之间从帽兜中变出(像变魔术一样) → 蒙混， 欺骗

trans.tranCn: 遮眼, 欺骗, 蒙蔽
trans.tranOther: to trick someone in a clever way so that you can get an advantage for yourself
